addModerator(address,address).details: Owner or whale can add moderators

endLiveChat(address).details: Host, whale, or owner can end

joinVoiceChat(address).details: User can only be in ONE voice chat at a time

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerWhale(address,address).details: Can be called by owner or self-registered by holder

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.recipient: User to tip (can be anyone in chat)

shutdownDashboard(address).details: Stops all activity for this token's chat

startLiveChat(address).details: Only whale or owner can start

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addModerator(address,address).notice: Add a moderator for a token dashboard

canControlLiveChat(address,address).notice: Check if user can control live chat (whale threshold OR registered whale OR owner)

canModerate(address,address).notice: Check if user is a moderator for a token

canUseMessageBoard(address,address).notice: Check if user meets message board threshold (0.5% supply)

canUseVoiceChat(address,address).notice: Check if user meets voice chat threshold (1% supply)

endLiveChat(address).notice: End a live voice chat session

getDashboardInfo(address).notice: Get full dashboard info including live status

getRecentMessages(address,uint256).notice: Get recent messages for a token dashboard

getUserStatus(address,address).notice: Get full user status for a token dashboard

getUserVoiceChat(address).notice: Get which voice chat a user is currently in (0 = none)

isInVoiceChat(address,address).notice: Check if user is in voice chat for this token

isLiveChatActive(address).notice: Check if live chat is active

isMessageBoardActive(address).notice: Check if message board is active

muteUser(address,address).notice: Mute a user in voice chat (moderator, whale, or owner)

registerWhale(address,address).notice: Register/update the whale for a token

sendMessage(address,string).notice: Send a message to token dashboard chat

sendSuperChat(address,address,uint256,st.notice: Send super chat tip to another user in the chat

sendSuperChatPLS(address,address,string).notice: Send super chat with PLS (native token)

shutdownDashboard(address).notice: Shutdown a token dashboard (emergency - owner only)

startLiveChat(address).notice: Start a live voice chat session
